text:
Thank you very much for your time today! If there's
anything else you need, please don't hesitate to ask...!

I'll do my best to not inconvenience you,
Aketa-san, and give it my all──

──Ah! It's right before the performance, so you want to
focus, right...! I'm sorry for bothering you, I'll excuse myself!!

Is that so?
...Did I do something wrong?

I think it's just a misunderstanding.
Because Mikoto has this stoic image.

Is that so...
...Should I clarify the misunderstanding?

──No, I think it's fine to just be your usual self, Mikoto.
I'm sure it'll come across better than explaining with words.
